title: [discussion] manual positioning of cut_coords n plotting functions should accept only list

text: So docstring is not meant to be updated ??

Yes, but more particular of examples exposing to use list rather tuple. I agree doc is different and you use can tuple. But, point here is to teach users to give as list.

Thats still in the discussion. But for now we new examples are meant to be seen as list.
